bodybutters.name: Coffee Body Butter
bodybutters.description: A rich, nourishing body butter infused with organic coffee extract to deeply moisturize and rejuvenate your skin.

bodybutters.name: Cocoa Body Butter
bodybutters.description: An ultra-hydrating cocoa-infused body butter that provides long-lasting moisture and a natural glow.

bodybutters.name: Shea Butter Bliss
bodybutters.description: A luxurious shea butter blend for ultimate hydration and smooth skin.

bodybutters.name: Almond Body Butter
bodybutters.description: Deeply nourishing almond-infused body butter with a subtle nutty scent.

coffee.name: Kenyan Coffee - Classic Roast
coffee.description: A smooth and bold classic roast made from premium Kenyan coffee beans.

coffee.name: Kenyan Coffee - Vanilla Flavor
coffee.description: A delightful blend of Kenyan coffee infused with natural vanilla essence.

coffee.name: Kenyan Coffee - Caramel Flavor
coffee.description: Rich caramel-infused Kenyan coffee for a sweet and bold taste experience.

coffee.name: Kenyan Coffee - Hazelnut Flavor
coffee.description: A nutty and aromatic Kenyan coffee blend with smooth hazelnut flavor.

coffee.name: Kenyan Coffee - Mocha Flavor
coffee.description: A perfect fusion of chocolate and coffee flavors in a premium Kenyan blend.

coffee.name: Kenyan Coffee - Cinnamon Spice
coffee.description: A warm and spicy cinnamon-infused Kenyan coffee for a cozy experience.
